title: 8. TOOLS - What we as esthies love and use daily
description:
Hi everyone! In this episode we're sharing our favorite at-home tools! We talk cleansing, massaging, cold rolling, lymphatic drainage, and more.

Let us know what you think by leaving us a review! Looking forwrd to your feedback! Xo, Tess + Lo

Tess' Instagram @tzolls + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Music by LiQwYd 

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
